title: Foreign sample font in field 19 of Additional Opentype names in Fontlab
content: I need to insert the Osage alphabet (currently under ballot) here, and I can, but when I do, it doesn't display properly, at least in Apple's Font Book.
author: evertype

comments.content:
IGNORE THIS THREAD. Please see the other one which has the full posting. This one was cut short because of the under-ballot Osage characters seem to have choked the forum software.

ADMIN: you can delete this thread.
